name: The massive boots, 'Facetramplers'
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
The Facetramplers, true to their name, allow their wearer to trample the faces
